strings.Value: "Greetings. Well, my darlings. You've broken your divine patron's second condition, just as I foretold."
"So you knew what was going to happen to us at the House at the Edge of Time?"

"I surmised. I led you by the hand through all your adventures in the Stolen Lands. I brought you to the Disk of the Eclipse. I made sure you arrived at just the right place, where the magic of the First World would rid you of the divine curse you've suffered, so you may reunite. Aren't progenitors supposed to look after their offspring? And I am a very caring ancestor!"
"And now, if you'll excuse me, Your Highness. It was a pleasure dealing with you, but there are greater forces than you at work here, and it's time they resolve their differences!"
"And now, if you'll excuse me." {n}You hear undisguised mockery in the devil's voice.{/n} "I'll leave you to your destroyed kingdom, and the insane fey lord who has seized it!"
{n}You catch Kalikke's scream and Kanerah's angry hiss. As the portal closes, you discern the familiar silhouette of the ruined Taldan tower, rising above Sorrowflow.{/n}
